section.title: CC 1.1.6 CentOS 7.2 has fixed a defect that prevents fstrim from working (ZEN-23525)
section.p: There was a defect in CentOS 7.2 that prevented fstrim from working. In kernel version 3.10.0-327 or higher, fstrim now works. Ensure that your system is running this kernel version or higher. To check the kernel version, as the root user, execute the following command: uname -r
If you need to update your kernel, execute yum -y update or yum -y update kernel

section.title: CC 1.1.3/RM 5.1.1: Turn off logical volume monitoring for the serviced pool (CC-2158)
section.p: Sometimes LVM decides to resize itself and if it doesn't have enough space it will unmount the device. To avoid this situation you should turn off the LVM self monitoring for the serviced-pool using the following command: lvchange --monitor n serviced/serviced-pool
